name: SettingsManagerESP32
description: Manage your ESP32 device preferences effortlessly with the SettingsManagerESP32 library. This powerful yet user-friendly library abstract away the complexities of dealing with ESP32 Non-Volatile Storage, providing you with a seamless and intuitive interface to store and retrieve your device settings.
keywords: arduino, esp32, espressif, preferences, settings, nvs, manage, manager, configuration, store, storage
